lead_paragraph: VIGODA--Abe, 94, passed away peacefully in his sleep at the home of his loving daughter, Carol Vigoda Fuchs. Abe began an iconic and successful career as a talented actor in childhood. Proudly served in the United States Army. Adoring grandfather to Paul, Steven and Kellie (Bergen), and Jamie Fuchs. Delighted great-grandfather to Johnathan. Respected uncle to five nieces and nephews and two great-nieces. Funeral Services to be held on Sunday, January 31, 2016, 12pm, at "The Riverside" on Amsterdam and 76th St., New York. 1/3
